column1: Uchi////Best sushi/seafood I've ever had. My boyfriend's father has been going here for years so he knows one of the chefs. Whenever we go
column2: we don't even bother looking at the menu! We literally tell the chef to surprise us and keep the dishes coming until we're full. Although the rolls are super yummy
column3: it feels like a crime indulging in such fresh seafood that's hidden in something else. We usually do sashimi. I have yet to have one thing I have not liked and have been here atleast 8-10 times. I've had every dessert and they are ALL very yummy. I definitely cannot afford this place on a teacher's salary however
column5: it's the perfect spot to get treated.
